Class ExpiresHeader

              +--org.zoolu.sip.header.ExpiresHeader
public class ExpiresHeader
extends SipDateHeader

SIP Header Expires.

Note: for backward compatibility with legacy implementations the date format is still supported although it has been deprecated in RFC 3261.
